quote: We will win this battle because we are fighting for our lives and the lives of our Clanmates. Our enemies are already dead. They fight only out of hate and that will be their weakness.
quote_letters: WE WILL WIN THIS BATTLE BECAUSE WE ARE FIGHTING FOR OUR LIVES AND THE LIVES OF OUR CLANMATES OUR ENEMIES ARE ALREADY DEAD THEY FIGHT ONLY OUT OF HATE AND THAT WILL BE THEIR WEAKNESS
